00027 require_once 'Zend/Translate/Adapter.php';

00036 class Zend_Translate_Adapter_Csv extends Zend_Translate_Adapter
00037 {
00038     private $_data    = array();
00039 
00048     public function __construct($data, $locale = null, array $options = array())
00049     {
00050         $this->_options['delimiter'] = ";";
00051         $this->_options['length']    = 0;
00052         $this->_options['enclosure'] = '"';
00053         parent::__construct($data, $locale, $options);
00054     }
00055 
00065     protected function _loadTranslationData($filename, $locale, array $options = array())
00066     {
00067         $this->_data = array();
00068         $options     = $options + $this->_options;
00069         $this->_file = @fopen($filename, 'rb');
00070         if (!$this->_file) {
00071             require_once 'Zend/Translate/Exception.php';
00072             throw new Zend_Translate_Exception('Error opening translation file \'' . $filename . '\'.');
00073         }
00074 
00075         while(($data = fgetcsv($this->_file, $options['length'], $options['delimiter'], $options['enclosure'])) !== false) {
00076             if (substr($data[0], 0, 1) === '#') {
00077                 continue;
00078             }
00079 
00080             if (!isset($data[1])) {
00081                 continue;
00082             }
00083 
00084             if (count($data) == 2) {
00085                 $this->_data[$locale][$data[0]] = $data[1];
00086             } else {
00087                 $singular = array_shift($data);
00088                 $this->_data[$locale][$singular] = $data;
00089             }
00090         }
00091 
00092         return $this->_data;
00093     }
00094 
00100     public function toString()
00101     {
00102         return "Csv";
00103     }
00104 }
